formulas.name: formula_10_myRule_9_A2_5793083846
formulas.expression: TODAY()+10

formulas.expression: "Register as Employer " + IF( ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Account.BillingState} ), "", "(" & {!myVariable_current.Account.BillingState} & ")" ) + " | " + {!myVariable_current.Account.Name}

formulas.expression: {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.MRM__c}

value.stringValue: CASE( TEXT([Task].LLC_Info_Status__c), "Info Complete - No Updates","Completed", "Info Complete - Only DB Updates","Completed", "Info complete - Only File Updates","Open", "Info Complete -DB & File Updates","Open", "Completed" )

value.stringValue: AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject, "Verify Formation Details"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status , "Completed"), [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "Verify Formation Details" )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: AND( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject}, "Verify Formation Details"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , "Completed"), {!myVariable_current.Current_Opp_Stage__c} = "Verify Formation Details" )

value.stringValue: AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject, "Review Transition Plan"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status , "Completed") )

value.stringValue:
AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject , "Register as Employer"), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status , "Completed"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status),
OR( [Task].Account__r.BillingState ="TEXAS", [Task].Account__r.BillingState ="TX", [Task].Account__r.BillingState ="Texas", [Task].Account__r.BillingState ="MA", [Task].Account__r.BillingState ="PA", [Task].Account__r.BillingState ="VA" ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_35
formulas.expression:
AND( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject} , "Register as Employer"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , "Completed"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}),
OR( {!myVariable_current.Account__r.BillingState} ="TEXAS", {!myVariable_current.Account__r.BillingState} ="TX", {!myVariable_current.Account__r.BillingState} ="Texas", {!myVariable_current.Account__r.BillingState} ="MA", {!myVariable_current.Account__r.BillingState} ="PA", {!myVariable_current.Account__r.BillingState} ="VA" ) )

value.stringValue: AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject, "Email LLC Docs"), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status , "Completed"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "Email LLC Docs" )
